name: Land Flipping
effectText: Target 1 face-up card in a Field Zone; banish it, then place it face-up in the other Field Zone, then, you can choose 1 Field Spell with a different original name in the current controller's GY, and place it face-up in the Field Zone of the player whose card was banished. You can only activate 1 "Land Flipping" per turn.
